title: Reusable Sponge Blocks (Cut-to-Fit) — Mechanical Stage
notes: Primary mechanical media; trim to fit HOB/canisters; rinse in tank water.

title: Poly Filter Floss Roll — Fine Mechanical Polishing
notes: Fine particulate polishing; replace as it clogs; improves clarity.

title: Ceramic Bio Rings / Sintered Media — Biological
notes: High surface area for nitrifying bacteria; never fully replace at once.

title: Bio Balls — Biological Aerobic Media
notes: Durable aerobic media; great oxygen exposure; rinse gently in tank water.

title: Seachem Purigen — Chemical Polishing Resin
notes: Removes organics; polishes water; can be regenerated with bleach and Prime.

title: Activated Carbon — Chemical (Granular)
notes: Adsorbs meds/tannins/odors; replace regularly; remove when medicating.

title: Phosphate Remover (GFO) — Chemical
notes: Targets phosphates to help manage algae; monitor PO₄ to avoid bottoming out.
